facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 43.4 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 27.9 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 was 0.9 % in 2002.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio increased from 75 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 82 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 59.9 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 19 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - increased from 23.6 % in 2000 to 25.6% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament declined from 20.0873 % in 2000 to 16.3028% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 11.65 % in 2000 to 39.24% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , 11 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 4.19508 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 3.62622 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -3.95 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.63 kilograms in 2000 to 0.25 kilograms in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 95.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 30.3993721008301 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 4.19508 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 3.62622 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018 , 0.02231 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 57.57827 % in 2000 to 41.78224% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 0 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 11.61623 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 4.40 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2009 , there were about 100 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority
